ComicInfo.Title: The Addled Family; Spies and Saboteurs Hit the Winter Olympics Part II; The Replacement Shows; Cracked Collectors; Spies and Saboteurs Hit the Winter Olympics Part I; The Cracked Vidiot Musick Awards; Some of My Best Friends Are Monsters!; The Candidate; Cracked's New, Revamped (and Lots More Interesting) Olympic Events; Cracked Senator of the Year; Orehek at Large at a High School Graduation; Don Martin's Winter Olympics; Star Wreck The Next Degeneration
ComicInfo.Summary: A politician tries to improve his chances through plastic surgery but the surgeon accidentally gives him Michael Jackson's face.
